meanings.definition: Covered with or characterized by shrubs
meanings.sent1: The garden was the shrubbiest place in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The forest was full of the shrubbiest areas, making it hard to walk through.
meanings.sent3: The shrubbiest corner of the yard was where the mischievous cat liked to hide.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was so tangled and wild, it looked like the shrubbiest bush in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The shrubbiest landscape painted a picture of greenery and life.

meanings.definition: Having the most shrubs compared to others
meanings.sent1: The park on the corner was the shrubbiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: Among all the gardens, hers was the shrubbiest with a variety of plants.
meanings.sent3: The shrubbiest yard in the neighborhood won the 'Greenest Garden' award.
meanings.sent4: His backpack was the shrubbiest, filled with plants he collected on his nature walk.
meanings.sent5: The shrubbiest hill in the distance looked like a green carpet under the sun.
